title: Coming soon...
text:
We will have some exciting news to announce soon.

Watch this space.

title: The Apocalypse is here
text:
Out now - "The Apocalypse" - the first single from morvern's upcoming EP Happy Hour Bungalow Drip.

Listen now on Bandcamp or watch the videospot on Youtube.

Happy Hour Bungalow Drip will be released through ŠOP Records on 17 June 2024.
Pre-order on Bandcamp or pre-save for streaming.

title: Happy Hour Has Arrived
text:
Out now on ŠOP Records - Happy Hour Bungalow Drip - a new 5-track EP featuring the single "The Apocalypse".

Available now on Bandcamp, Spotify, Apple Music and Deezer.

Watch the videospot for "The Apocalypse" on Youtube.

title: New Morvern Merch
text:
Super comfy crew tees are waiting for you!

In black or yellow designs, size S to 3XL.
Available in limited quantities from Bandcamp.

Get yours before they're gone!

title: New Music from Morvern
text:
Out now, a new music video - "whisper" - from morvern's upcoming EP WHISPER.

The WHISPER EP will be released through ŠOP Records on 01 October 2025.
